cnc-main-applicant-full-name.required: Enter the main applicant's full name
cnc-main-applicant-full-name.maxlength: Applicant's full name must between be 3 and 250 characters
cnc-main-applicant-full-name.minlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
cnc-main-applicant-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

cnc-main-applicant-dob.required: Enter the applicant's date of birth
cnc-main-applicant-dob.before: Main applicant's date of birth must be in the past
cnc-main-applicant-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
cnc-main-applicant-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth

cnc-main-applicant-nationality.required: Select the main applicant's country of nationality

cnc-who-is-completing.required: Select who completed the original form

cnc-application-visa-type.required: Select what type of visa the application was for

cnc-who-is-representing.required: Select who you are legally representing

cnc-further-leave-to-remain.required: Select which type of further leave you applied for

cnc-sponsor-type.required: Select what type of sponsor you are

cnc-dependant-or-guardian.required: Select whether you are a dependant or a guardian of a dependant

cnc-reference-number.required: You must provide a reference number. Select one you can provide

enter-record-number.minlength: Record number must be between 9 and 12 characters
enter-record-number.maxlength: Record number must be between 9 and 12 characters
enter-record-number.recordNum: Enter a real record number. For example, ROD123456789
enter-record-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.
enter-record-number.recordMaxLength: Record number must be between 9 and 12 characters

enter-case-id.minlength: Case ID must be at least 8 numbers
enter-case-id.maxlength: Case ID cannot be more than 8 numbers
enter-case-id.numeric: Case ID can only include numbers
enter-case-id.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.

enter-ho-reference-number.required: Enter a Home Office reference number
enter-ho-reference-number.minlength: Home Office reference must be at least 8 characters
enter-ho-reference-number.maxlength: Home Office reference number cannot be more than 8 numbers
enter-ho-reference-number.hoRefNum: Home Office reference number must start with a letter, followed by 7 numbers
enter-ho-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.
enter-ho-reference-number.hoRefMaxLength: Home Office reference number cannot be more than 8 numbers

enter-payment-reference-number.maxlength: Payment reference number cannot be more than 100 characters
enter-payment-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.

enter-courier-reference-number.maxlength: Courier reference number cannot be more than 100 characters
enter-courier-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.
